content:
TITLE: Generating Static HTML for MusicXML Docs
DESCRIPTION: Creates a static HTML version of the MusicXML documentation in the specified directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python manage.py makesite ../docs/
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing MusicXML Spec Data into Local Database
DESCRIPTION: Loads the MusicXML specification data from a JSON file into the local database.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python manage.py loaddb musicxmldoc.json
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Serializing MusicXML Database to JSON
DESCRIPTION: Exports the current state of the MusicXML documentation database to a JSON file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python manage.py freezedb musicxmldoc.json
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Django Web Server for MusicXML Docs
DESCRIPTION: Starts the Django development server to view and edit MusicXML documentation locally.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python manage.py runserver
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Local Database for MusicXML Docs
DESCRIPTION: Runs Django migrations to initialize a local SQLite database for MusicXML documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python manage.py migrate
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Local Database with Latest MusicXML Docs
DESCRIPTION: Loads the latest MusicXML documentation data from the JSON file into the local database.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python manage.py loaddb musicxmldoc.json
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Serving Static MusicXML Docs with Python HTTP Server
DESCRIPTION: Uses Python's built-in HTTP server to serve the static MusicXML documentation files locally.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python -m http.server --directory /path/to/docs/
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Python Package Requirements
DESCRIPTION: Specifies required Python packages and their versions for a project. Uses Django version 4.2.15 and lxml version 4.6.3 or higher.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
django==4.2.15
lxml>=4.6.3
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Required Python Modules for MusicXML Docs
DESCRIPTION: Installs the necessary Python modules, including Django, from the requirements.txt file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Local Version of MNX Documentation Generator
DESCRIPTION: Installs the local version of the MNX documentation generator for use with MusicXML docs.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip install -e /path/to/local/mnxdocgenerator
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning MNX Documentation Generator Repository
DESCRIPTION: Clones the MNX documentation generator repository to a local directory for use with MusicXML docs.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/w3c-cg/mnxdocgenerator.git /path/to/local/mnxdocgenerator
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Python Virtual Environment for MusicXML Docs
DESCRIPTION: Creates a Python virtual environment named 'musicxmldocs' in the user's home directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
python3 -m venv ~/musicxmldocs
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Activating Python Virtual Environment for MusicXML Docs
DESCRIPTION: Activates the previously created Python virtual environment for MusicXML documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/w3c/musicxml/blob/gh-pages/doctools/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
source ~/musicxmldocs/bin/activate
```
